game.name: 元气桌面壁纸
game.shortDescription: Ultra-clear 4K dynamic and static wallpapers, rich beautification components, mouse skins, and transparent taskbars. There are also computer themes that change with time, featuring a simple and user-friendly interface for one-click settings.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ultra-clear 4K dynamic and static wallpapers, rich beautification components, mouse skins, and transparent taskbars. There are also computer themes that change with time, featuring a simple and user-friendly interface for one-click settings.
game.developers: 海南豹趣科技有限公司
game.publishers: 海南豹趣科技有限公司
